edu.illinois.mitra.starl.interfaces

Interface SmartComThread

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Cancellable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SimSmartComThread, SmartUdpComThread

    public interface SmartComThread
extends Cancellable
    Low level communication thread which handles sending and receiving of packets. Received packets are passed to the associated SmartCommsHandler.
    See Also:
    SmartCommsHandler

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      void setCommsHandler(SmartCommsHandler sch)
      Assign a SmartCommsHandler to handle all received packets.

        cancel

    • Method Detail

      • setCommsHandler

        void setCommsHandler(SmartCommsHandler sch)
        Assign a SmartCommsHandler to handle all received packets. Any packets received before a SmartCommsHandler is associated will be discarded without warning.
        Parameters:
        sch - the SmartCommsHandler handler to use

      • write

        void write(UdpMessage msg,
           java.lang.String IP)
        Send a message
        Parameters:
        msg - the message to send
        IP - the destination IP address
